news.1.title: Cleanup day in the main park
news.1.desc: This Saturday there will be a cleanup day in the main park to collect plastics and waste. Bring your gloves and join in!
news.2.title: 500 trees planted along the riverbank
news.2.desc: Thanks to volunteers, the community has planted 500 new trees around the Green River area.
news.3.title: Campaign to reduce plastic use
news.3.desc: Ecotxurdi has launched an educational campaign about sustainable alternatives to plastic.
news.4.title: Eco photography contest
news.4.desc: Participate by sending your best photos of nature around you and win eco-friendly prizes.
news.5.title: New composting sites in the city
news.5.desc: The City Council has set up three new composting points in different neighborhoods for organic waste.

rewards.4.title: Public transport pass
rewards.4.desc: 10-ride pass on public transport to reduce your carbon footprint.
rewards.5.title: Ticket to natural park
rewards.5.desc: Free entry for one day to a nearby nature reserve.
